简介

游戏的画风相当不错，游戏人物都是动态cg，带有x光的差分，各种姿势都有 BizzareHolyLand is a fantasy-themed visual novel revolving around the story of angels and demons. You, as a mysterious holy boy, will journey across the wonderful world and have an intimate relationships with all kinds of angels and demons!Thread Updated: 2025-05-17Release Date: 2025-05-12Developer: HMO Patreon – Itch.io – DiscordCensored: NoVersion: 51.0OS: Windows, Linux, Android, MacLanguage: English
